content.text: Welcome to the Netherlands! You're at a 'haringkraam' (herring stand) to try a famous Dutch snack: raw herring. Let's learn how to order.

data.phrase: Ik wil graag een broodje haring.
data.meaning: I would like a herring sandwich.

content.title: The Initial Order
content.setting: You step up to the counter of a busy fish stand. The vendor smiles at you.

conversation_flow.title: State you want a herring sandwich
Say 'yes, with onions'
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, een broodje haring. Met uitjes?

content.title: Customizing Your Order
content.setting: The vendor is about to prepare your herring.

conversation_flow.title: Say 'no, thank you'
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Komt voor elkaar. Wil je er ook zuur bij?

conversation_flow.title: Say 'yes, cut into pieces'
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Prima. Moet ik de haring in stukjes snijden?

content.title: Asking to Pay
content.setting: The vendor hands you the prepared herring on a small tray.

conversation_flow.title: Ask if you can pay by card

content.title: Handling a Payment Problem
content.setting: You've just asked to pay by card, but the vendor shakes his head.

conversation_flow.title: Say you only have 50 euros
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Nee, sorry. Het pinapparaat is kapot.

content.title: Completing the Transaction
content.setting: The vendor looks in his cash box after you asked about change.

conversation_flow.title: Say 'that is good'
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja, ik heb wisselgeld voor 50 euro.

conversation_flow.title: Say you will pay with cash
